Waltz of the Toreadors [1962]

This is the end of a glorious military career: General Leo Fitzjohn retires to
his Sussex manor where he will write his memoirs. Unfortunately, his private
life is a disaster: a confirmed womanizer, Leo has infuriated his wife Emily,
now a shrewish and hypochondriac woman, all the more bitter as she still loves
him. The General has two plain-looking daughters he dislikes and an attractive
French mistress, Ghislaine, with whom he has had a platonic affair for
seventeen years. When Ghislaine resurfaces, determined to complete her love
with him and to get rid of Emily, Leo is at a loss what to do...     

Starring: Peter Sellers, Dany Robin, Margaret Leighton
Director: John Guillermin
